Title: The Third Miracle
Writer: Richard Vetere (novel), John Romano (screenplay), Richard Vetere (screenplay)
Actors: Sofia Polanska, Pavol Simon, Ivan Lukac, Patrik Minar
Plot: A skeptical Bishop sends a broken priest as Postulator to investigate the possible beatification of a simple, devout woman whose death caused a statue of the Virgin Mary to bleed upon and cure a girl with terminal lupus. The politically weary priest unknowingly embarks on a spiritual journey that rebuilds his shattered faith and life.
Production: Franchise Pictures, Haft Entertainment, American Zoetrope
